name: Validating the Registration Feature
description:
As a user
    I want to register for an account
    So that I can access the application
descriptionHtml:
As a user
I want to register for an account
So that I can access the application

testStage.description:
As a user
    I want to register for an account
    So that I can access the application

steps.name: Given I navigate to the registration page
When I enter the name as "Raman Arora"
Then I enter the phone number as "9711191558"
And I enter the email as "info@way2automation.com"
And I select the country as "Germany"
And I enter the city as "Berlin"
And I enter the username as "raman123"
And I enter the password as "raman123"
And I click the register button
